sentences.cn: “ 它越过诸多英里的拱跨,是否雄伟壮丽? ”

sentences.en: Accordingly, separating herself from her companions , she swam, solitary and majestically, round the pond.
sentences.cn: 于是她远离同伴, 独自威风地绕着池塘游来游去.

sentences.en: Fuji is a majestically beautiful mountain.
It was draped majestically over the living room sofa, presented to me artistically and lovingly.
sentences.cn: 它庄重地沿着起居室的沙发靠背拖曳着, 如同一件艺术品栩栩如生地展现在我眼前.

sentences.en: Peoples flee when you thunder and threaten , nations scatter when you rise majestically.
sentences.cn: 叫嚣的声音一响,民众遂即逃遁;你一奋起, 万民便都溃散.

sentences.en: She has seen dally from her chamber-window towers, villages, faint white mansions; above all the town of Shaston standing majestically on its height; its windows shining like lamps in the evening sun.
sentences.cn: 每天她都从自己房间的窗户里看见教堂的钟楼、村庄和白色的屋宇；尤其是高踞山顶的威严的沙斯顿小镇特别惹人注意；小镇的窗玻璃在夕阳里闪闪发光，宛如一盏盏灯火。

sentences.en: She rose majestically to her feet.
She strode majestically through the palace.
sentences.cn: 她威严地大步在宫殿中走过.

sentences.en: The Empress Hotel majestically overlooks Victoria's inner harbour.
sentences.cn: 皇后酒店以宏伟的眼神俯瞰这维多利亚港的内湾.

sentences.en: The Majestically - holding Sphinx : A View on " My Ah Q "
sentences.cn: 雄踞的斯芬克斯: 论 “ 我的阿Q ”

sentences.en: The Reds started both halves majestically.
sentences.cn: 上下半场,红军的发起都无可挑剔.

sentences.en: The waters of the Changjiang River rolled to the east on majestically.

sentences.cn: 白雪皑皑的山峰耸入云霄.

sentences.en: When the corner came in, he caught it majestically.
sentences.cn: 当角球开进来时, 他亦威严地把球接住.

trans.tran_cn: 雄伟地，庄重地，威严地，崇高地
